OSGiService - Annotation Type in org.ops4j.peaberry
Annotates members of your implementation class (constructors, methods and fields) where the Injector should either inject an OSGi service proxy, or a ServiceTrackerCustomizer implementation, backed by a ServiceTracker.
OSGiServiceDependencyBindingFactory - Class in org.ops4j.peaberry.internal

OSGiServiceRegistration - Annotation Type in org.ops4j.peaberry
Annotates members of your implementation class (constructors, methods and fields) where the Injector should take the injected implementation and register it with the framework as an OSGi service.
OSGiServiceRegistrationBindingFactory - Class in org.ops4j.peaberry.internal
Provide on-demand bindings for OSGi service registrations.
OSGiServiceRegistrationBindingFactory() - Constructor for class org.ops4j.peaberry.internal.OSGiServiceRegistrationBindingFactory
 
OSGiServiceRegistry - Interface in org.ops4j.peaberry
Helper to manage registered OSGi services, a default implementation is bound to this interface in the Module supplied with the Peaberry bundle.
